review.comment: If you are after, not only an agent, but a whole complete professional team at the top of the real estate game that goes well above and beyond the typical real estate agent (not to mention the very modest commission fee) then The Cooper Group is the one for you!! Quite simply the best around, I sold in Tasman and Debbie and the team were more than happy to literally go the extra mile!! Could not recommend highly enough!!

The entire Debbie Cooper Group was a pleasure to work with, but working with Debbie herself was outstanding. She was professional, listened to our concerns, and guided us around some rare problems we came up against. Upon meeting her she respected all aspects of the process; the house, the vendors and the buyers. We would use her again in an instant and highly recommend her if you want the process of buying or selling your house done right.

Debbie Cooper and her team provided an excellent service that sets them apart in their field. They are extremely well presented, experts in their field and professional, yet warm, friendly and easy to talk to.
We were nervous making the decision to sell our house and Debbie put our minds at ease by explaining the whole process, keeping us informed regularly, going above and beyond in ensuring we felt comfortable, and being approachable.
The results were fantastic, we were thrilled with the outcome.
Thank you Debbie and team!

Debbie Cooper understood exactly what we needed!
The current market is very competitive when it comes buying a house! Debbie was patient, understanding and listened intently to all our requirements. She has an excellent knowledge of the Nelson market and did a fantastic job of matching our needs to our new house! We highly value her integrity & honesty and would highly recommend Debbie!
